text: André Cornélis is a 1918 French silent film directed by Georges Denola and Jean Kemm and starring Romuald Joubé, Pierre Magnier and Henry Krauss.Goble p.49 It is based on the 1886 novel André Cornélis by Paul Bourget. Kemm subsequently directed another version also titled André Cornélis in 1927. ==Cast== * Romuald Joubé * Pierre Magnier * Henry Krauss * Paul Duc * Marie- Louise Derval * Mary Dorska * Jean Kemm ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. ==External links== * Category:1918 films Category:French films Category:Films directed by Jean Kemm Category:Films directed by Georges Denola Category:French silent feature films Category:Films based on French novels Category:Pathé films Category:French black-and-white films
title: André Cornélis (1918 film)
